tool_description: The Official Match Schedule for the 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil.
name: Official World Cup
title: Official World Cup

api_list.name: Matches
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-official-world-cup.p.rapidapi.com/wc/matches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-official-world-cup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-official-world-cup.p.rapidapi.com/wc/matches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-official-world-cup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
